questions:
What is the photo mainly about?
A) A landscape scene
B) A building reflected in a car mirror
C) A crowded street
D) An indoor event

Where was the photo taken?
A) Inside a house
B) In a city park
C) Inside a car
D) At a beach

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The car's interior
B) The reflection in the car mirror
C) The sky
D) The flowers

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) The car's side mirror and a building
D) A building

What is reflected in the car mirror?
A) A person
B) A church-like building
C) Another car
D) A mountain

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) The car's side mirror
B) A tree
C) A mountain
D) A street

What can be seen in the background of the photo?
A) A busy street
B) The interior of a house
C) Part of a building with windows
D) A beach

What kind of building is reflected in the car mirror?
A) A modern skyscraper
B) A traditional church-like building
C) A shopping mall
D) A residential apartment

What is the color of the building in the background?
A) Blue
B) White with brown trim
C) Yellow
D) Green

What type of flowers are visible in the photo?
A) Roses
B) Tulips
C) Mixed flowers in a planter
D) Sunflowers

What is the color of the window frames of the building in the background?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) Red

What type of vehicle is partially visible in the photo?
A) A bicycle
B) A car
C) A motorcycle
D) A bus

How many windows are visible on the building in the background?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the state of the sky in the reflection?
A) Completely clear
B) Overcast
C) Partially cloudy
D) Stormy

What type of structure is the building with the reflection?
A) A residential house
B) A commercial building
C) A religious structure
D) An industrial building

What is the primary material of the building in the background?
A) Glass
B) Wood
C) Brick and plaster
D) Metal

What element adds a decorative touch to the building in the background?
A) A fountain
B) A balcony with woodwork
C) A statue
D) A mural

What is the color of the planter visible in the foreground?
A) Red and white
B) Blue
C) White
D) Green

What can be seen near the bottom of the reflection in the car mirror?
A) Grass and flowers
B) Pavement
C) Water
D) Sand

What is the shape of the building's roof in the reflection?
A) Flat
B) Dome-shaped
C) Gabled
D) Arched

What is the condition of the grass seen in the photo?
A) Well-maintained
B) Overgrown
C) Dry and brown
D) Non-existent

What is the color of the trim around the windows of the building in the background?
A) White
B) Brown
C) Red
D) Black

What is the primary color of the flowers in the planter?
A) Yellow
B) Red
C) Purple and white
D) Pink

What is the texture of the car interior visible in the photo?
A) Smooth leather
B) Rough fabric
C) Glossy plastic
D) Matte plastic

What is the primary feature of the car visible in the photo?
A) The steering wheel
B) The rearview mirror
C) The side mirror
D) The dashboard

What is the color of the sky in the reflection?  
A) Gray  
B) Blue and White  
C) Orange  
D) Pink

What is the primary focus of the reflection in the car mirror?
A) The road
B) The building
C) The sky
D) Another vehicle

What is the primary color of the building in the reflection?
A) Yellow
B) White and brown
C) Red
D) Blue

What is the primary material of the car's side mirror?
A) Metal
B) Plastic and Glass
C) Glass
D) Carbon fiber and Glass

What type of plants can be seen in the foreground?
A) Cacti
B) Flowering plants
C) Shrubs
D) Trees

What is the primary color of the car's side mirror?
A) Black
B) Silver
C) Red
D) Blue

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A building seen through a car mirror
C) A landscape
D) A piece of artwork

What can be seen on the wall of the building in the background?
A) Graffiti
B) Windows with brown frames
C) A mural
D) Posters
